mapper.select: SELECT ci.comment_id AS commentId, su.user_id AS userId, su.user_name AS userName, su.user_avatar AS userAvatar, ci.content, ci.create_time AS createTime, ci.like_count AS likeCount FROM comment_info ci JOIN sys_user su ON ci.user_id = su.user_id and su.delete_flag = 0 WHERE ci.target_type = #{targetType} AND ci.target_id = #{targetId} AND ci.level = 1 and ci.delete_flag = 0 ORDER BY ci.like_count DESC

SELECT ci.comment_id AS commentId, su.user_id AS userId, su.user_name AS userName, su.user_avatar AS userAvatar, ci.content, ci.create_time AS createTime, ci.like_count AS likeCount FROM comment_info ci JOIN sys_user su ON ci.user_id = su.user_id and su.delete_flag = 0 WHERE ci.parent_comment_id = #{parentCommentId} AND ci.delete_flag = 0 ORDER BY ci.like_count DESC
